    BERI

    BERI mailing lists

    BERI anouncement mailing list

    The BERI announcement mailing list carries news of new BERI releases, software updates, events, etc. Subscribe to cl-beri-announce here.

    BERI discussion mailing list

    The BERI discussion mailing list is intended to support the community of BERI users, and is suitable for questions, announcements, patches, etc. Subscribe to cl-beri-discuss here.
